main event: On 25 August 1952, objects were sighted in the sky near Holloman AFB, New Mexico, which were described as moving faster than a jet and displaying unusual flight patterns.
interesting points: The observer noted that the objects were silver in color and round in shape, The sighting lasted between 3 to 5 minutes, The objects were observed to be circling the area and making sharp turns, The objects reflected sunlight but emitted no sound, The report identified that no type of optical or electronic equipment was used to verify the objects.
sighted object: one round and flat silver object in the sky
witness description: Foreman and Utilities Operations and Plant Supervisor at Holloman AFB
